articles.content:
Talks between delegations of WPK and Russian party
     Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Talks were held here yesterday between the delegations of the Worker's Party of Korea and the Communist Worker's Party of Russia.       Both sides informed each other of activities of their parties and exchanged views on the issues of mutual concern including development of the friendly relations between the two parties. Present at the talks on the WPK side were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the party central committee, and officials concerned and on the Russian party side were members of the delegation headed by V. Tyulkin, first secretary of the party central committee.
